Key to the families of Dicotyledons
Key to the genera of Gentianaceae

leads.lead_text: Plant biennial, with prominent basal leaf rosette at time of flowering; corolla pale pink, the tube usually distinctly longer than calyx at anthesis
Plant annual, usually lacking a basal leaf rosette at time of flowering; corolla bright rose-pink to magenta, the tube not or hardly longer than calyx at anthesis

Main stem(s) with 2–4 internodes below lowermost branch; branches spreading from main axis at up to 45°; flowers with pedicels 1–5 (–10) mm long; corolla usually bright rose pink; seeds mostly 0.15–0.25 mm diam

Main stem(s) with 5–9 internodes below lowermost branch; branches not widely spreading (usually 15°-25° from main stem); flowers sessile, or with pedicels to 2 mm long; corolla magenta; seeds mostly 0.25–0.35 mm diam
